::Spears::

She growled back as he pushed her hand away,"If you show this type of 
disrespect to Master Prebon, you will answer to me. I will not 
tolerate this type of disrespect towards the Master, you peice of 
recycled scrap."  She pulled out a spear and stood there, waiting for 
a fight to break out.  She knew who he was, but under Prebon's 
orders, she wasn't allowed to say anything.  She glared at him and 
stood fast with the spear at her side.



--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Slayer::
> 
> Slayer bares his wolfish teeth, looking down at the hand. A deep 
> growl emerges from his throat as Slayer resists the urge to slag 
this 
> female.
> 
> "Out of my way, femm," he says rudely, pushing the hand aside and 
> continuing after Prebon, toward the war suit.
>
